name: Potato and Onion Hash
recipeIngredient: 2 medium-sized potatoes (about 300g total), cut into small cubes
Salt and black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: 1. Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the onions and garlic to the skillet and sauté until translucent, about 3 minutes.
3. Add the potatoes to the skillet and stir to combine with the onions and garlic.
4. Sprinkle the thyme, salt, and pepper over the potato mixture and stir to distribute the spices evenly.
5. Cover the skillet and cook for about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking and ensure even cooking.
6. Uncover the skillet and continue cooking for another 10 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and lightly browned, stirring occasionally.
